original_text: When thou shalt vow a vow unto the Lord thy God, thou shalt not slack to pay it: for the Lord thy God will surely require it of thee; and it would be sin in thee.
korean_text: 네 하나님 여호와께 서원하거든 갚기를 더디하지 말라 네 하나님 여호와께서 반드시 그것을 네게 요구하시리니 더디면 그것이 네게 죄가 될 것이라

sentences.original_text: When thou shalt vow a vow unto the Lord thy God
sentences.korean_translation: 네가 네 하나님 여호와께 서원할 때에

sentences.original_text: thou shalt not slack to pay it
for the Lord thy God will surely require it of thee
sentences.korean_translation: 네 하나님 여호와께서 정녕 네게서 요구하시리니

sentences.original_text: and it would be sin in thee
